Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerstate

Contains all the possibles states of a player during a match. Sort of State Pattern.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MovableState
    States when the player can move
    PendingPaymentState
    States when the player is paying to use something
    PlayerState
    This interface must be implemented by every PlayerState.
    TargetingPlayerState
    States when the player is selecting Target Players
    TargetingSquareState
    States when the player is selecting Target Squares
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AfterSelectedAggregateActionState
    State of the player after selecting an AggregateAction
    ChoosingWeaponOptionState
    State of the player while choosing a WeaponMode
    ChoosingWeaponState
    State of the player while choosing which Weapon to use
    DiscardingWeaponState
    State of the player while discarding a weapon
    IdleState
    State of the player when it's not its turn and it has not been shot
    ManageTurnState
    Main state of the player
    PendingPaymentReloadBeforeShotState
    State when the player is paying to reload a weapon
    PendingPaymentReloadWeaponState
    State when the player is paying to reload
    PendingPaymentScopeState
    State when the player is paying to use a Scope power up
    PendingPaymentWeaponOptionState
    State when the player is paying to use a weapon mode
    PendingPaymentWeaponState
    State when the player is paying to buy a Weapon
    ReadyToShootState
    State when the player is shooting and selecting targets
    ScopeState
    State when the player uses a Scope power up
    SelectedAggregateActionState
    State when the player just selected an AggregateAction
    SelectedNewtonState
    State when the player is using a Newton powerup
    SelectedTeleporterState
    State when the player is using a Newton powerup
    SelectedWeaponState
    States when the player is using a weapon
    SelectScopeTargetState
    State when the player is selecting targets to use a Scope power up
    ShootedState
    State when the player has just been shot
